doc.title: Eugenia Ma
doc.plot: Harold, unfulfilled by his friends, becomes obsessed with a woman named Eugenia Ma who is suspiciously absent throughout the film although utterly present through his monologues and dialogues with others. His quest beckons us to question, who is this individual whose absence is the quest itself? Who are we? What various place markers such as the ones in this yearbook define us? Are we all searching for Eugenia Ma? Are we all in fact Eugenia Ma?
